cable.title: Ethernet
cable.no_wan: No cable detected in WAN port. Please insert an ethernet cable.
cable.rm_wan_cable: Please remove the ethernet cable from the WAN port.
cable.wan_been_lan: WAN port has been used as LAN. You can set it back to WAN below
cable.confirm_to_lan: Are you sure you want to use the WAN port as LAN?
cable.confirm_to_wan: Are you sure you want to change LAN port back to WAN?
cable.repeated: Connected successfully without having to reconnect
cable.dhcp_tips: IP address is assigned by higher network machine.
cable.pppoe_vlanid_tips: This settings entry is only required if the provider's PPPoE server requires the interface to use a tagged specific VLAN ID.
cable.egderouter_mode_tips: Drop-in gateway is enabled. If you want to modify the Ethernet settings, please disable $$$$Drop-in Gateway$$$$ first.
cable.change_to_lan_check_tips: First, please unplug the Ethernet cable that is plugged into the WAN port. $$$$ re-detect $$$$
cable.change_to_wan_tips: Once the LAN port is used as a WAN port, you will not be able to access the administrator panel via this Ethernet port connected to the LAN port. Please ensure that your client can connect to Wi-Fi or other LAN port.
cable.change_to_wan_tips2: You can restore the LAN port (so that it is no longer used as a WAN port) by pressing and holding the reset button on the device for four seconds.
cable.reset_port_tips: You can restore the {silkprint} by pressing and holding down the device's reset button for 4 seconds.
cable.use_as_wan_tips: {asWan}, the device connected to the port can't access the admin panel anymore. You'll have to connect it to Wi-Fi or other LAN ports.
cable.revert_as_lan_tips: Are you sure to restore the {silkprint} to LAN port (default)?
cable.revert_wan_tips: After you restore the WAN port
cable.use_as_wan_silkprint_tips: Once the {silkprint} is used as a WAN port

tethering.title: Tethering
tethering.no_device_tips: No Tethering device found, Plug in your smartphone or USB Modem to start.

repeater.title: Repeater
repeater.allow_change: Allow Switching to Other Saved Networks
repeater.allow_change_tips: If the option is enabled, the router will automatically connect to other saved networks when it is unable to connect to the current Wi-Fi network.
repeater.antijam_tips: If this option is enabled, the device will improve the stability of the connection by reducing the connection rate.
repeater.lock_band_tips: If you manually select a band, the router will not scan or connect to any Wi-Fi that is using another band.
repeater.antijam_tips_2: It only works when repeating 2.4G Wi-Fi.
repeater.lock_bssid_tips: If this option is enabled, the router will only connect to the AP corresponding to the BSSID you selected when switching to a network using this SSID.
repeater.allow_dfs_tips1: If the option is enabled, when the router repeat Wi-Fi on any DFS channel, it will follow the hotspot for DFS channel avoidance. When this Wi-Fi is available, the router's own 5GHz Wi-Fi will use the DFS channel. Otherwise, the router's own 5GHz Wi-Fi will switch back to the non-DFS channel.
repeater.allow_dfs_tips2: If this option is disabled, the router will not connect to any Wi-Fi using DFS channels.
repeater.retry_disable_guest_tips: While attempting to reconnect, your router will periodically scan for Wi-Fi networks, and your guest Wi-Fi network will be temporarily unavailable during this scan.
repeater.scan_disable_guest_tips: During the scan for Wi-Fi signals, your guest network will be temporarily unavailable for about ten seconds. Do you wish to continue?
repeater.fail_not_found_tips: Could not find the network, please check the SSID and security type you entered.
repeater.unusable_eap_tips: This router doesn't support repeat networks that use EAP.
repeater.fail_mac_tips: The MAC address of the router cannot be the same as any Wi-Fi client, please $$$$modify the MAC of the clone$$$$ or modify the MAC address of that client.
repeater.scan_wifi_fail_dfs_tips: The device is running the DFS channel availability check and cannot scan for nearby Wi-Fi. please wait for the check to finish.
repeater.connet_dfs_tips: When the router repeats a WiFi with a DFS channel, if this WiFi is available, the router will use the selected DFS channel. Note that if this WiFi is not available, the channel will be switched, which will result in a brief disconnection of the client connected through the WiFi, and some devices will be reconnected without sensing, while some need to be reconnected manually.
repeater.modify_wifi_tips: Changes in network settings will make the repeater reconnect.
repeater.enable_disguise_tips: If this option is enabled, this router camouflage itself as the same device as the client device you are now using.
repeater.allow_auto_portal_tips: If this option is enabled, this router will automatically enter Login Mode for Public Hotspots when it successfully connected to a hotspot but not the Internet. This mode will pause VPNs and custom DNS until it leave, which may cause data leaks to the provider of the hotspot (e.g., hotel/mall).
repeater.allow_auto_portal_label: Auto-Enable Login Mode for Public Hotspots
repeater.auto_portal_tips: The device has entered Login Mode for Public Hotspots to access the Captive Portal's hotspot. After successful login, it will automatically leave this mode.
repeater.entered_portal_tips: The device is in Login Mode for Public Hotspots. VPNs and custom DNS has been paused, which may cause data leaks to the provider of the hotspot (e.g., hotel/mall). After successful login, this router automatically quit this mode. {exit}.
repeater.need_enter_portal_tips: Can’t access the internet via the repeated hotspot. Try to enter {portal} to fix the issue. Note this mode will pause VPNs and custom DNS until it leave, which may cause data leaks to the provider of the hotspot (e.g., hotel/mall).
repeater.cannot_accessed_portal_url_tips: If you cannot access the login page, try disabling other Internet connections (e.g., ethernet, cellular).

modem.title: Cellular
modem.plug_in_tips: No Modem device found. Plug in your USB modem to start.
modem.name: Modem Name
modem.install_sim_tips: Please insert your SIM card into the SIM slot, then
modem.port_tips: The cdc-wcdm0 port is faster, and the ttyUSBX port has better compatibility.
modem.apn_tips: Some SIM cards require a specific APN. If you don't know the correct APN, please ask your network operator .
modem.ttl_tips: Some network operators will determine whether the SIM card is used by the router by reading the TTL value. If your SIM card cannot be used on the router, you could try to set the TTL to a value other than 64 and 128 (for example, 65).
modem.sim_lock: SIM card has been locked, please input the PIN code to unlock it.
modem.traffic_tips: The traffic statistics are for information only; actual traffic is determined by your network operator and will appear on the bill provided by your network operator.
modem.clear_traffic: Disable Auto Saving of Traffic Statistics
modem.clear_traffic_tips: If the option is enabled, the system will not automatically save traffic statistics.
modem.no_sim_tips: Your SIM card has not been detected. Please check that the card has been inserted correctly and that the contacts are clean. The Modem does not support hot-swappable SIM cards. If you re-inserted the SIM card after boot, please $$$$Reboot Modem$$$$ or reboot your router.
modem.connecting_tips: Some SIM cards have special usage restrictions, for example, the need to use a specific APN. If your SIM card cannot be registered, please check with your network operator to see if your SIM has any special restrictions.
modem.sim_no_profile_warning: No setting has been selected, it will be configured automatically.
modem.sim_failover_interval_tips: If the Internet connection is still not available after failover has occurred, the device will switch back to the preferred SIM slot and will only retry failover after this interval.
modem.timing_check_main_sim_tips: If this option is enabled, the device will try to switch back to the preferred SIM slot at the specified time. This feature allows you to switch back to the preferred SIM slot when its internet connection is available.
modem.remove_profile_warning: Are you sure you want to delete the profile? The profile cannot be recovered after deletion.
modem.set_detection_tips: The Internet status is detected in the same way as the settings in the $$$$Multi-WAN$$$$ page.
modem.band_only_tips: In "Open" mode, the router will only use the bands, the others will be blocked.
modem.band_masking_tips: In "Block" mode, the router will block the following bands.
modem.band_only_warning: Please select at least one of the allowed bands.
modem.no_sim_tips2: Your SIM card has not been detected. Please check that the card has been inserted correctly and that the contacts are clean.
modem.select_profile_desc: You can $$$$ Select a Profile $$$$ to copy the contents of it to the settings used by the SIM card.
modem.has_been_choose_profile_desc: You have copied the contents of {profileName}. $$$$ Copy Another Profile$$$$
modem.locked_tower_tips: If the locked tower does not match the band masking or APN parameters in the cellular settings, the cellular interface will not be able to connect to the Internet.
modem.device_may_not_b_tips: The device may not be able to scan all towers when the Cellular interface is enabled.
modem.cellular_desc: The Cellular interface will reconnect to switch to the locked tower.
modem.scan_tower_msg: This may take a few minutes. Please be patient.
modem.reboot_buildin_modem_warning: Are you sure want to reboot the built-in Modem ?
modem.sim_slot_pin_mark_tips: The SIM card slot has been marked and cannot be automatically switched.
modem.need_pin_no_history_tips: You need to enter the PIN code, and you have {count} attempts remaining.
modem.need_pin_history_tips: The PIN code {value} is incorrect. You have {count} attempts remaining.
modem.pin_locked_history_tips: PIM code {value} error, SIM card was locked.
modem.protocol_tips: The QCM/QMI protocol are faster, and the 3G protocol has better compatibility.
modem.last_pin_tips: There is one last remaining try to unlock the PIN code for this SIM card, if it fails to be entered again, you will need to use the PUK code to unlock it. To prevent your SIM card from being locked, the device will not dial again, so please use your phone to unlock it.
modem.need_pin_tips: SIM card is locked, please check if there is a PIN code entered or if the PIN code entered is correct.

sms.title: SMS
sms.not_found_sms_modem: This modem does not support SMS
sms.send_error_msg1: The Modem has not been detected.
sms.send_error_msg5: The device doesn't support SMS Feature.
sms.send_error_msg6: The current network environment doesn't support SMS Feature.
sms.forward_email_tips: If you want to forward SMS to email, please set the sender email first. This is the email address that the SMS will be sent from.
sms.forward_email_subject_tips: You can modify the subject so that you can identify which phone number the SMS was received from.
sms.forward_phone_tips: If you want the router to forward SMS to your cell phone, make sure that your mobile network is available and supports sending SMS.
sms.forward_tips: To prevent circularity, SMS forwarding will not be allowed when the local number is entered here. Additionally, if the Modem does not read the number of your SIM card, SMS forwarding will not be executed.

guide.configure_router_tip: The Network guide helps you configure your router and connect it to the Internet in just a few minutes.
guide.tethering_description_option: Connect to the Internet via usb tethering.
guide.ethernet_description_option: Connect to the Internet via an Ethernet cable.
guide.repeater_description_option: Connect to the Internet via an existing Wi-Fi.
guide.cellular_description_option: Connect to the Internet via cellular.
guide.use_vpn_protect_privacy: Using a vpn can protect your privacy.
guide.tethering_connected_description: Tethering configuration is complete. You can enjoy the internet now.
guide.tethering_connect_fail_title_start: Now the network cannot be connected, please try the following ways.
guide.wait_window_pop_up: Wait until the Trust This Computer window pops up. Click Trust.
guide.iphone_for_demonstration: iPhone12 (iOS version: 17.5.1) is used for demonstration.Please operate according to the interface corresponding to your mobile phone.
guide.connect_phone_or_pad_by_use_cable: Connect your iPhone/iPad to the router using a USB cable.
guide.turn_on_cellular_and_tap_on_personal_hot: Go to Settings, make sure Cellular Data is turned on, and tap on Personal Hotspot.
guide.android_for_demonstration: MI 8 Lite (Version: Android 10) is used for demonstration.Please operate according to the interface corresponding to your mobile phone.
guide.connect_mobile_device_to_router: Connect your mobile device to the router using a USB cable.
guide.enable_portable_hotspot_and_usb_tetherin: Enable Portable hotspot and USB tethering.
guide.make_sure_cellular_is_turn_on: Make sure the cellular data of your mobile device is turned on.
guide.device_connected_and_network_normal: {device} has connected and network is normal
guide.change_wifi_connection: 2.The WiFi signal may be weak, then change a WiFi connection.
guide.network_loading_tip: The Network guide helps you configure your router and connect it to the Internet in just a few minutes.
guide.enter_correct_ssid_or_key: 1.Please enter the correct WiFi SSID or Password.
guide.repeater_join_success_tip: Repeater configuration is complete. You can enjoy the internet now.
guide.concat_us_to_solve_repeater_question: 4.If the problem is not solved, please email support@gl-inet.com.
guide.repeater_device_connected_and_network_no: {device} has been connected and network is normal
guide.lan_port_position_exception_tip: LAN port detects a network cable, please make sure the cable is inserted in the correct position.
guide.no_cable_detected_tip: No cable detected. Please connect the network cable to the WAN port.
guide.enter_info_by_isp_tip: Enter the information provided by your ISP.
guide.ethernet_connected_tip: Ethernet configuration is completed. You can enjoy the internet now.
guide.select_proto_type_tip: Select this type if your ISP doesn't provide any information for internet connection.
guide.check_password_correct_tip: Please make sure the broadband account password is correct, if you forget it, you can contact the operator.
guide.ethernet_concat_us: 4.If the problem is not solved, please email support@gl-inet.com.
guide.connection_is_normal: Current network connection type is DHCP and network status is normal.
guide.pppoe_is_normal: Current network connection type is PPPoE and network status is normal.
guide.make_sure_wan_position_is_correct: Currently the WAN port is used as LAN, if you want to set up Ethernet, please make sure the WAN port is used as WAN.
guide.wait_for_four_second_to_login_tip: The device is in Login Mode for Public Hotspots. Automatically Go to Login after 4 seconds.
guide.enter_login_mode_for_public_hotspots_tip: Click the Next button to enter Login Mode for Public Hotspots.
guide.enter_to_guide_no_internet_tip: If you don't know how to configure the network, you can click here to enter the beginner guide.

enter_to_guide.tip: Click here to enter the beginner guide again.

guide.make_sure_authorized_and_network_is_norm: 1.Make sure your phone is authorized and the phone network is available.
guide.check_connection_and_cable: 2.Check the USB cable connection and remove or replace the USB cable.
